source_question: 最近的我的精神状态如何，有什么变化？

localizations.name: 精神-当前状态
localizations.description: 分析当前的精神状态，包括情绪、思维模式等。
localizations.summary: 了解当前的精神状态，为后续分析提供基础。

localizations.name: Emotion-mental state
localizations.description: Reflects your current emotional well-being and inner state.
localizations.summary: Your mental state may be influenced by emotional fluctuations.

localizations.name: 精神-变化趋势
localizations.description: 观察精神状态的变化，包括积极或消极的变化。
localizations.summary: 识别精神状态的变化趋势，为调整提供方向。

localizations.name: Emotion-changes
localizations.description: Highlights any shifts or developments in your emotional landscape.
localizations.summary: Changes in your emotions could be impacting your overall well-being.

localizations.name: 精神-内在驱动力
localizations.description: 分析内在驱动力对精神状态的影响，包括动力来源和影响程度。
localizations.summary: 探究内在驱动力，为精神状态的提升提供动力。

localizations.name: Mindset-awareness
localizations.description: Focuses on your level of consciousness and self-awareness.
localizations.summary: Increasing self-awareness can help navigate emotional changes effectively.

locales.question: 最近的我的精神状态如何，有什么变化？
locales.overall_summary: 通过分析当前精神状态、变化趋势和内在驱动力，全面了解精神状态的变化及其原因，为精神健康提供指导。

locales.question: How has my mental state been recently, and what changes have occurred?
locales.overall_summary: Your mental state is closely tied to emotional fluctuations and recent changes. Developing self-awareness can aid in understanding and managing these emotional shifts effectively.
